targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_InputVoltage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_InputVoltage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

panels.title: Input/Output, Energy, Load V, Wh, W

targets.query: SELECT sum("LOADPCT") / 100 * 865 FROM "APC" WHERE "LOADPCT" = 'loadpercent' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT last("value"::integer) & 2 FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_UPSStatus_BF') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value"::integer) & 4 FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_UPSStatus_BF') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value"::integer) & 8 FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_UPSStatus_BF') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value"::integer) & 64 FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_UPSStatus_BF') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value"::integer) & 8192 FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_UPSStatus_BF') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(mean("value")) /1000*$kwhprice FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_Output.Energy') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT sum("LOADPCT") / 100 * 865 FROM "APC" WHERE "LOADPCT" = 'loadpercent' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("LOADPCT") / 100 * 865 FROM "APC" WHERE "LOADPCT" = 'loadpercent' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("LOADPCT") / 100 * 865 FROM "APC" WHERE "LOADPCT" = 'loadpercent' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT INTEGRAL(on_battery) AS "BATTERY" FROM (SELECT FLOOR(1/("value"+1)) AS on_battery FROM "modbus_value"  WHERE  ("type_instance" = 'ups_InputVoltage') AND $timeFilter)
SELECT INTEGRAL(on_line) AS "ONLINE" FROM (SELECT 1-(FLOOR(1/(value+1))) AS on_line FROM "modbus_value"  WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_InputVoltage') AND $timeFilter)
SELECT sum("LOADPCT") / 100 * 865 FROM "APC" WHERE "LOADPCT" = 'loadpercent' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)

SELECT difference(last("value")) FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_Output.Energy') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("value"))*$kwhprice/1000 FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_Output.Energy') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("value")) FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_Output.Energy') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("value"))*$kwhprice/1000 FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_Output.Energy') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT FLOOR((last("value"::integer) & 4)/4) AS on_BAT FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_UPSStatus_BF') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT FLOOR((last("value"::integer) & 2)/2) AS on_LINE FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_UPSStatus_BF') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT FLOOR((last("value"::integer) & 8192)/8192) AS GreenMode FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_UPSStatus_BF') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT FLOOR((last("value"::integer) & 256)/256) AS StateOutputOff FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_UPSStatus_BF') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT FLOOR((last("value"::integer) & 16384)/16384) AS Test_Modifier FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_UPSStatus_BF') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "modbus_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'ups_Output.Energy') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "power" WHERE "host" = 'mainpower' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") *0.22/1000 FROM "power" WHERE "host" = 'mainpower' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
